data.title: Celebrate Christmas with RBSO’s “Sound of the Seasons”
data.description: Enjoy a magical festive concert with Dutch conductor Sander Teepen and soprano Jeannette van Schaik, marking 420 years of Thai-Netherlands relations.

data.title: New movies out this week: Dec 12-18
data.description: New releases that hit cinemas in Thailand this week.

data.title: More Gong Yoo for you to stream
data.description: In The Trunk, South Korean heartthrob Gong Yoo plays a music producer who, believing he can never fall in love again after his divorce, hires a contractual wife for a year to fill the void. The romantic thriller rocketed to the number one spot on Netflix

data.title: A toast to 40 years of River City Bangkok
data.description: In celebration of its remarkable 40th anniversary, River City Bangkok presents two special exhibitions that offer a profound exploration of its storied legacy and enduring achievements -- a gateway to the world of art.

data.title: The art of falling mid-air
data.description: Moca Bangkok presents "In Just A Blink Of An Eye", a thought-provoking performance piece by renowned Chinese contemporary artist Xu Zhen.

data.title: A monster with a message
data.description: Art lovers are invited to explore the origins of a cute monster during "Bakumbaa: I Am The Monster" which is running at RCB Photographers

data.title: Bright lights, big city, fun New Year
data.description: Moxy Bangkok Ratchaprasong has transformed its hotel space into a street art gallery during "Fun Hunters Of Bangkok", until Dec 31.

data.title: Plastic fantastic
data.description: While studying at the Thai Art Department, Faculty of Painting, Sculpture and Graphic Arts, Silpakorn University, Supanwasri Ngarmpanja, also known as Lazuli, often visited temples. It was during one such visit to Wat Arun Ratchawararam that Supanwasri first encountered Benjarong plasterwork. She was impressed with this unique art form.

data.title: Singer, national artist Santi Lunpae dies, aged 88
data.description: Sub-Lt Santi Lunpae, a national artist in the field of performing arts, died of old age early Tuesday at King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital, Bangkok. He was 88.

data.title: Artist explores possibilities in the abstract
data.description: Art lovers are invited to explore the liminal space between paintings and sculptures during "(Brackets)" which is running at SAC Gallery until Jan 11.

data.title: One in a million stars
data.description: Though Asian-American hip-hop artist Star2 is based in San Diego, California, his roots belong in Asia.

data.title: Atta Gallery presents intersecting worlds
data.description: Our environment and the events surrounding us have served as a wellspring of inspiration for two veteran female artists from two countries during "Intersection: Where Two Paths Meet", which is running at Atta Gallery until Jan 12.

data.title: Dick Van Dyke, approaching 99, dances in Coldplay’s latest video
data.description: NEW YORK — Dick Van Dyke, the lithe and witty nonagenarian whose career spans more than seven decades, has added yet another role to his lengthy resume: music video star.

data.title: Korean stars to gather in Bangkok for Asia Artist Awards
data.description: The South Korean entertainment awards ceremony 2024 Asia Artist Award will be held for the first time in Bangkok.

data.title: The long search for the truth
data.description: On Dec 26, 1996, John and Patsy Ramsey woke up after a joyful family Christmas to discover their youngest child, six-year-old JonBenét, missing. A chilling ransom note had been left downstairs. Later that day, John Ramsey discovered his daughter

data.title: Trumpet star to perform with RBSO
data.description: Russian-born Israeli trumpet player Sergei Nakariakov will be guest soloist in the next concert by the Royal Bangkok Symphony Orchestra (RBSO) which will take place in the Main Hall of Thailand Cultural Centre, Ratchadaphisek Road, on Dec 14 at 7.30pm.

data.title: Chiang Mai set to showcase local talent
data.description: The local creativity of Chiang Mai will be showcased on a global scale during Chiang Mai Design Week 2024, which will kick off this Saturday and run until Dec 15.

data.title: Illustration fair returns to CentralWorld
data.description: The Bangkok Illustration Fair is back with works by Thai and foreign illustrators at CentralWorld Live, 8th floor of CentralWorld, Ratchadamri Road, from tomorrow to Sunday.

data.title: Soulful grooves
data.description: On a recent warm Bangkok evening, Shintaro Sakamoto stepped onto the stage at Maho Rasop Music Festival for his first-ever performance in Thailand. For fans of the Japanese singer/songwriter, it was an electrifying moment -- a rare opportunity to witness the visionary artist who has quietly redefined modern music with his eclectic blend of soft rock, reggae, bossa nova and psychedelia. As a founding member of the legendary rock band Yura Yura Teikoku and now a celebrated solo artist, Sakamoto

data.title: BMS rings in festive season with concert
data.description: Bangkok Music Society (BMS) is holding its festive season concert at the Evangelical Lutheran Church in Thailand, Sukhumvit 50, on Saturday starting at 4pm.
